title: Broccoli Cheddar Quiche
steps: To make the crust, mix together cheese, flour, mustard, butter, and salt. Press evenly onto bottom and sides of a 10-inch pie dish.
In a large pan over medium-high heat, saut√© broccoli and onions for 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and cook another 2 minutes.
To make the filling, mix together eggs evaporated milk, nutmeg, and pepper. Add broccoli, onions, and mushrooms.
Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 375 F, then bake another 20 minutes, or until a knife in the centre comes out clean.
